original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam na sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na cittam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na saraṇam na cetasikam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam na citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam na citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nacittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nacittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na saraṇam na citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na citta anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ
analyzed: na saraṇam na citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhu

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca

original: …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na ajjhattikam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nabāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam na bāhiram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: na saraṇam na aupādāḥ dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cattāri

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na aupādinnam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam na anupādinnam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
